data.name: SDLTMAnonymizer_AcceptsNoLiability_Description_Line01
data.value: The tool has been designed to help the Client create specific rules in accordance with their requirements and tag identifiable information.

data.value: Please wait until we connect to GroupShare

data.value: Please select at least one translation unit to apply the changes.

data.value: Please select the files you want to import

data.value: File was exported successfully to selected location.

data.value: Do you want to remove selected tms?

data.value: Please select at least one translation memory and a rule to preview the changes.

data.value: Are you sure you want to remove selected rules?

data.value: Existing fields values will be overwritten with the values form the file

data.value: Are you sure you want to import an excel file?

data.name: SDLTMAnonymizer_AcceptsNoLiability_Description_Line02
data.value: RWS accepts no liability associated with creating such tags or any errors or omissions associated with the use of the tool or any deliverables.

data.name: Please_wait_while_process_will_be_cancelled
data.value: Please wait while process will be cancelled...

data.name: SDLTM_Anonymizer_Description
data.value: TradosTM Anonymizer is a plugin for Trados Studio that provides functionality to anonymize personal information in both server and file-based Translation Memories

data.name: Source_directory_does_not_exist_or_could_not_be_found_0
data.value: Source directory does not exist or could not be found: {0}

data.name: Activate_the_Enable_checkbox_for_all_rules_that_should_be_applied_to_this_project
data.value: Activate the 'Enable' checkbox for all rules that should be applied to this project.

data.name: Activate_the_Enable_checkbox_for_all_data_that_should_be_encrypted_using_an_encryption_key
data.value: Activate the 'Enable' checkbox for all data that should be encrypted using an encryption key.

data.name: New_regular_expressions_or_plain_text__can_be_added_either_by_typing_them_into_
data.value: New regular expressions, or plain text, can be added either by typing them into the empty row at the end of the grid, or by importing an Excel file containing the rules or lists of names, addresses etc...

data.name: To_edit_a_rule_double_click_on_the_cell
data.value: To edit a rule double click on the cell.

data.name: To_remove_a_rule_select_the_rows_and_hit_the_Delete_key
data.value: To remove a rule select the rows and hit the ‘Delete’ key.

data.name: Do_not_forget_this_or_you_wont_be_able_to_decrypt_the_data_later
data.value: (Do not forget this or you won’t be able to decrypt the data later)

data.value: The tool has been designed to help the Client create specific rules in accordance with their requirements and tag identifiable information.
